ruling: - See [[Gladiator Beast Alexander]] for additional rulings.

- If [[Gladiator Beast Laquari]] is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, its original ATK becomes 2100. If [[Skill Drain]] is later activated, this effect is negated and [[Gladiator Beast Laquari]]'s original ATK will return to 1800. Even if [[Skill Drain]] is later negated or removed from the field, the original ATK of [[Gladiator Beast Laquari]] will remain at 1800.

- If [[Gladiator Beast Laquari]] is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster and it is flipped face-down, when it is flipped face-up its effect will not be reapplied so its original ATK will be 1800.
